title: sutantaram tarum
sahitya:
sutantaram tarum ayyE Atma sutantaram tarum ayyE


anupallavi

  hitam tarum aram poruL inbam vIDAgiya iniya nAr-selvamum engaLukk-eidavE


caraNam    uNmaiyai uNmaiy enrulagin mun uraikka oLi perum unnaruL uLLattir-sirakka
 tImaiyAi edirttu nAn tImaiyai sidaikka dEsham ellAm unadu tiruppugazh viLakkavE
